title: Students plan gun control protests after Parkland shooting
text:
Students plan gun control protests after Parkland shooting Monday, February 19, 2018 - 01:20 
Stunned by the deadliest high school shooting in U.S. history, students are mobilizing across the country to organize rallies and a national walkout in support of stronger gun laws, challenging politicians they say have failed to protect them.   
Stunned by the deadliest high school shooting in U.S. history, students are mobilizing across the country to organize rallies and a national walkout in support of stronger gun laws, challenging politicians they say have failed to protect them.  //reut.rs/2ENODb1
